definition: may you enjoy boundless longevity (idiom)/long may you live

sentences.english: Uncle, Empress Mother, I wish you both everlasting happiness.

definition: abundant harvest of all food crops/bumper grain harvest
May you have peace year after year (New Year's greeting)
Live as long as the Zhongnan Mountains! (idiom)/Long may you live!
lit. (may you) have abundance year after year/(an auspicious saying for the Lunar New Year)
place at the imperial court, where emperor handled government affairs, gave orders etc
to offer birthday congratulations (to an elderly person)
to start practicing at the first crow of the cock (idiom)/to be diligent in one's studies
to accept a life of ease/to enjoy a comfortable retirement
(myth.) peaches of immortality, kept by Xi Wangmu/fresh or confectionery peaches offered as a birthday gift
ribbon (as a decoration)/cordon (diagonal belt worn as a sign of office or honor)
